fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Competition, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Communication

organisation_name: European Federation for Managers in Technologies of Information and Communication (eTIC-CEC)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Since its foundation, eTIC has been a member of CEC, the Confédération Européenne des Cadres (European Confederation of Managers). 
 
CEC is one of the two Confederations for European workers. It is specifically dedicated to European executives, engineers and managers. 
 
eTIC is also active and visible within the CEC network which gathers the CEC members : www.cec-managers.info
goals__remit:
eTIC is a Federation representing the European Managers working in the field of technologies of information and communication. 
 
eTIC was founded in Brussels in 1999 with the name "Medi@Managers". Its 7 founding organisations were issued from: Belgium, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Norway and Sweden. In September 2006, the General Assembly chose a new name for the federation: eTIC.
